pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Bayesian Repulsive Biclustering Model for Periodontal Data // Simultaneously clusters the Periodontal diseases (PD) patients and their tooth sites after taking the patient- and site-level covariates into consideration. 'BAREB' uses the determinantal point process (DPP) prior to induce diversity among different biclusters to facilitate parsimony and interpretability. Essentially, 'BAREB' is a cluster-wise linear model based on Yuliang (2020) doi:10.1002/sim.8536.
